content:
# The error indicates that I do not have a stone furnace in my inventory, which is preventing me from placing it at the desired position.
# I need to ensure that I have the stone furnace available before trying to place it.

# First, I will check my inventory to see if I have the stone furnace and, if not, I will craft one.

# Inspecting the inventory to check for the stone furnace.
inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Check the current inventory.
stone_furnace_count = inventory.get(Prototype.StoneFurnace, 0)  # Get the count of stone furnaces in inventory.

print(f'Stone Furnace Count: {stone_furnace_count}')  # Print the count of stone furnaces in inventory.

# If I do not have any stone furnaces, I will craft one.
if stone_furnace_count == 0:
    # Ensure I have the necessary materials to craft a stone furnace.
    ensure_craftable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft a stone furnace if not available.
